revised_title: In Memoriam: Notable Scientists and Their Contributions
tldr: The President's Anniversary Address highlights the accomplishments and contributions of several notable scientists who passed away in 1937. These individuals made significant advancements in various fields, including pathology, chemistry, physics, anatomy, entomology, and physiology. Their work has left a lasting impact on science and medicine.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies
